pages.title: Osteolepis
pages.text: $(l)Temporal Range:$() Devonian$(br2)$(l)Habitat:$() Forest, Floodplain, Savannah, Vale$(br2)>Osteolepidae
Osteolepis is a lobe finned fish from the Devonian period with fossils found in northern Scotland. It was really small and was covered with large square scales.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
